kitchen-susans.Name: LSFC-22  Lazy Susan Folding Concealed Hinge
kitchen-susans.Body:
Now here is something totally new and unique. I call it the Folding Lazy Susan. I designed it to fit into the large storage spaces in your kitchen cabinetry. In many situations you will have plenty of storage space, but it will be difficult and annoying to get to the stuff in the back. In many instances, the access doors to these spaces are quite narrow, or there may be a support structure blocking the front. All of the Folding Lazy Susans are 22 inches in diameter and constucted with a heavy duty 3/4 inch Melamine product. If your kitchen cabinets are all white on the inside, this is the same type of material.  Custom sizing is available. Please email for a quote. Lazysusansrus@yahoo.com
     This susan utilizes the Concealed Hinging system. It provides a smooth clean surface for your fine china, glass stemware and Crystal.  This unit is very easy to assemble inside of your shelving. The edging provides a handy raised lip which will keep your items from sliding off.
       If you have an overhead kitchen cabinet similar to the one pictured below, I’m sure that you will find my new Folding Lazy Susans quite useful..
        Be sure to view the installation sequences below to see some useful applications. 

Click here to learn about swivel base upgrade

kitchen-susans.Name: Custom LSFC-24  Lazy Susan Folding Concealed Hinge
kitchen-susans.Body:
Now here is something totally new and unique. I call it the Folding Lazy Susan. I designed it to fit into the large storage spaces in your kitchen cabinetry. In many situations you will have plenty of storage space, but it will be difficult and annoying to get to the stuff in the back. In many instances, the access doors to these spaces are quite narrow, or there may be a support structure blocking the front.  This custom Folding Lazy Susan is 24 inches in diameter and constucted with a heavy duty 3/4 inch Melamine product. If your kitchen cabinets are all white on the inside, this is the same type of material. 
     This susan utilizes the Concealed Hinging system. It provides a smooth clean surface for your fine china, glass stemware and Crystal.  This unit is very easy to assemble inside of your shelving. The edging provides a handy raised lip which will keep your items from sliding off.
       If you have an overhead kitchen cabinet similar to the one pictured below, I’m sure that you will find my new Folding Lazy Susans quite useful..
        Be sure to view the installation sequences below to see some useful applications. 

Click here to learn about swivel base upgrade

kitchen-susans.Name: LSK-22  Kitchen Lazy Susan
kitchen-susans.Body:
This is the Solid Based Lazy Susan. By solid, I mean that it isn’t hinged, or folding. Unlike the cheap 12 inch plastic ones that you find in the store, this one  is a huge 22 inches in diameter and constructed with a heavy duty 3/4 inch Melamine product. If your kitchen cabinets are all white on the inside, this is the same type of material. It is designed to fit in your shelving that is a minimum of 22 inches wide and deep. Most lower kitchen cabinets and pantry stands are a standard 22 inches deep. Custom sizing is available. Please email for a quote ( lazysusansrus@yahoo.com ). This Susan arrives to you fully assembled with the edging installed. The edging has a handy raised lip so that your items won’t slide off.  This will make your storage space much more efficient, while allowing you very easy access just by spinning.

Click here to learn about swivel base upgrade

kitchen-susans.Name: LSFKD-6  Folding Lazy Susan, Double Deck, Concealed Hinges
kitchen-susans.Body:
Here is my Folding Double Decker Lazy Susans with 6 inch spacing. As in all of the Kitchen Lazy Susan line, they are 22 inches in diameter and constructed with a heavy duty 3/4 inch Melamine product. If your kitchen cabinets are all white on the inside, this is the same type of material. They are designed to fit in your shelving that is a minimum of 22 inches wide and deep. Most lower kitchen cabinets and pantry stands are a standard 22 inches deep. These units are quite unique in that both shelves are folding.  That means even if you have a corner or pantry cabinet with a restricted opening, you can now have a double deck susan.  If you are considering an installation in your overhead kitchen corner unit and not sure if these will fit, please click here to find instructions on how to make a simple circle pattern.

The folding decks utilize our concealed hinging system.  The surface of each shelf is completely clear and flat.  Perfect for storing fine china, glass stemware and your crystal pieces.  Custom sizing and spacing is available. Please email for a quote. The posts are made of a generous 7/8 wood dowelling. Although it may look difficult, these units are very easy to assemble inside of your shelving.

Click here to learn about swivel base upgrade

kitchen-susans.Name: LSKD-9  Kitchen Lazy Susan, Double Deck
kitchen-susans.Body:
These are my Solid Double Decker Lazy Susans. Unlike the cheap 12 inch plastic ones that you find in the store, these ones are a huge 22 inches in diameter and constucted with a heavy duty 3/4 inch Melamine product. If your kitchen cabinets are all white on the inside, this is the same type of material. They are designed to fit in your shelving that is a minimum of 22 inches wide and deep. Most lower kitchen cabinets and pantry stands are a standard 22 inches deep. Custom sizing and spacing is available. Please email for a quote. Both shelves are solid, in that they don’t fold or hinge. The 6 inch spacing is great for cans of soup and  vegetables. The 9 inch spacing is ideal for boxes such as Hamburger Helper, Chicken Helper and the like. The posts are made of a generous 7/8 wood dowelling. These units are very easy to assemble. The edging on both shelves will arrive installed. All you need to do is put in the 8 screws that hold the dowells in place an you’re set to go.

Click here to learn about swivel base upgrade

kitchen-susans.Name: LSFKD-9  Folding Lazy Susan, Double Deck, Concealed Hinges
kitchen-susans.Body:

The folding decks utilize our concealed hinging system.  The surface of each shelf is completely clear and flat.  Perfect for storing fine china, glass stemware and your crystal pieces.  Custom sizing and spacing is available. lazy-susan-tables.Name: LST-62  Traditional Style Lazy Susan Table (Ball and Claw legs)
lazy-susan-tables.Body:
As you can see in the following pictures, the 62 inch table is a perfect size for 6 people, but can seat up to 8 quite comfortably.  It is 29 inches high, and the inbuilt susan is an impressive 36 inches in diameter. As in the 50 inch version, this susan is easily removable for cleaning purposes. The swivel base mechanism is 24 inches in diameter. As you will notice, the 36 inch susan provides much more “real estate” for your various serving dishes. The outer plate perimeter is again 13 inches wide.  Hard to believe but true, that by adding only 12 inches across, this tables provides so much more room for your dining enjoyment than the 50 inch version.  Chinese and Mexican nights will never be the same!!

     

The entire table top, pedestal, and legs are manufactured of Solid Oak. This is a very durable, extremely rigid and solidly built table. As in the 50 inch version,  my same Rock Solid design assures that there is virtually no give when you lean on the table top edge. 

 

Click here for stain options.

lazy-susan-tables.Name: LST-62  Traditional Style Lazy Susan Table (3 Toed legs)
lazy-susan-tables.Body:
As you can see in the following pictures, the 62 inch table is a perfect size for 6 people, but can seat up to 8 quite comfortably.  It is 29 inches high, and the inbuilt susan is an impressive 36 inches in diameter. As in the 50 inch version, this susan is easily removable for cleaning purposes. The swivel base mechanism is 24 inches in diameter. As you will notice, the 36 inch susan provides much more “real estate” for your various serving dishes. The outer plate perimeter is again 13 inches wide.  Hard to believe but true, that by adding only 12 inches across, this tables provides so much more room for your dining enjoyment than the 50 inch version.  Chinese and Mexican nights will never be the same!!

     

The entire table top, pedestal, and legs are manufactured of Solid Oak. This is a very durable, extremely rigid and solidly built table. As in the 50 inch version,  my same Rock Solid design assures that there is virtually no give when you lean on the table top edge. 

 

Click here for stain options.

lazy-susan-tables.Name: LST-62  Traditional Style Lazy Susan Table (Empire legs)
lazy-susan-tables.Body:
As you can see in the following pictures, the 62 inch table is a perfect size for 6 people, but can seat up to 8 quite comfortably.  It is 29 inches high, and the inbuilt susan is an impressive 36 inches in diameter. As in the 50 inch version, this susan is easily removable for cleaning purposes. The swivel base mechanism is 24 inches in diameter. As you will notice, the 36 inch susan provides much more “real estate” for your various serving dishes. The outer plate perimeter is again 13 inches wide.  Hard to believe but true, that by adding only 12 inches across, this tables provides so much more room for your dining enjoyment than the 50 inch version.  Chinese and Mexican nights will never be the same!!

     

The entire table top, pedestal, and legs are manufactured of Solid Oak. This is a very durable, extremely rigid and solidly built table. As in the 50 inch version,  my same Rock Solid design assures that there is virtually no give when you lean on the table top edge. 

 

Click here for stain options.

lazy-susan-tables.Name: LST-50  Traditional Style Lazy Susan Table (3 Toed legs)
lazy-susan-tables.Body:
The 50 inch table is a perfect size for 4 people, but can seat up to 6 quite comfortably.  It is 29 inches high. The inbuilt susan is 24 inches in diameter. The plate perimeter is 13 inches wide.  
    
     The table top, Pedestal, and legs are manufactured of Solid Oak. This is a very durable, extremely rigid and solidly built table. With my Rock Solid design there is virtually no give when you lean on the table top edge.

The detail on these legs is amazing. These legs at the narrow part are  2 1/2 inches thick and at the widest, an amazing  4 1/2 inches. Also manufactured of Solid Oak,  once these are added to the 10 inch pedestal, an  overall leg span of 40 inches is achieved. This again provides a very stable base.

 

Click here for stain options.

lazy-susan-tables.Name: LST-50  Traditional Style Lazy Susan Table (Ball and Claw legs)
lazy-susan-tables.Body:
The 50 inch table is a perfect size for 4 people, but can seat up to 6 quite comfortably.  It is 29 inches high. The inbuilt susan is 24 inches in diameter. The plate perimeter is 13 inches wide.  
    
     The table top, Pedestal, and legs are manufactured of Solid Oak. This is a very durable, extremely rigid and solidly built table. With my Rock Solid design there is virtually no give when you lean on the table top edge.

Here is the Ball and Claw Leg system. These legs are indeed impressive. You have to admire the care and detail  that went into these remarkable pieces to achieve this look. These legs at the narrow part are  2 1/2 inches thick and at the widest, an amazing  4 inches. Please keep in mind that these are manufactured of Solid Oak.  Once these are added to the oversized 10 inch pedestal, an  overall leg span of 40 inches is achieved. This combination provides an exceptionally stable base. Most other table makers will only supply a 6 inch column.

 

Click here for stain options.

lazy-susan-tables.Name: LST-50  Traditional Style Lazy Susan Table (Empire legs)
lazy-susan-tables.Body:
The 50 inch table is a perfect size for 4 people, but can seat up to 6 quite comfortably.  It is 29 inches high. The inbuilt susan is 24 inches in diameter. The plate perimeter is 13 inches wide.  
    
     The table top, Pedestal, and legs are manufactured of Solid Oak. This is a very durable, extremely rigid and solidly built table. With my Rock Solid design there is virtually no give when you lean on the table top edge.

Here is the Empire leg system. The oak column is the same 10 inches in diameter. As mentioned earlier, most other table makers will only supply a 6 inch column. These legs are also a lot beefier than similar legs you may find on other manufacturers' tables. These legs are  2 1/2 inches thick and made of Solid Oak.  With an overall span of 38 inches, an extraordinarily stable base is again achieved.

 

Click here for stain options.

lazy-susan-tables.Name: LST-76-OAK  with turned spindle leg sytsem.
lazy-susan-tables.Body:
As you can see in the pictures, the 76 inch table is a perfect size for 8 people, but can seat up to 10.  It is 29 inches high, and the inbuilt susan is an impressive 48 inches in diameter. As in the smaller versions, this susan insert is easily removable for cleaning purposes. The swivel base machanism is 30 inches in diameter. This 48 inch susan provides much more “real estate” for your various serving dishes. The outer plate perimeter is a very generous 14 inches wide.      As a rule of thumb, you should allow 3 feet of space between the table and wall for chair room. For this table you will need a minimum room size of 12 x 12 feet.       The entire table top, and leg system are manufactured of Solid Oak. This is a very durable, extremely rigid and solidly built table. Rock Solid design assures that there is virtually no give when you lean on the table top edge. This edge itself is twice as  thick as the smaller versions giving much better proportion, as well as additional strength and rigidity. 

 

Click here for stain options.

myrtlewood.Name: LS-16 MYR   16 inches in diameter
myrtlewood.Body:
You never know exactly what you're going to get when you order one of our Myrtlewood lazy Susans, but you are always getting your money's worth.  The variation is quite drastic as you can see in the pictures.  This is probably my most favorite wood to work with because of the surprise I get when the character finally shows through upon final sanding and lacquer coats.

The 16 inch solid Myrtle lazy susan comes standard with a 6" steel swivel base.  Premium swivel base upgrades are available.  Click here to access my premium swivel base order page.

steel-bases.Name: 12" Steel Swivel Base
steel-bases.Body: This is our standard 12" steel swivel base offered on all our 24" or larger lazy Susans, but you can purchase it separately for your own project.  This swivel base is rated for over 1000 pounds!

steel-bases.Name: 9" Steel Swivel Base
steel-bases.Body: This is our standard 9" steel swivel base offered on all our 20" lazy Susans, but you can purchase it separately for your own project.

steel-bases.Name: 6" Steel Swivel Base
steel-bases.Body: This is our standard 6" steel swivel base offered on all our 16" lazy Susans, but you can purchase it separately for your own project.

super-size-cherry-lazy-susans.Name: LSS-24 CHE   24 inches in diameter
super-size-cherry-lazy-susans.Body: This is our 24 inch super susan made of solid Cherry.  These Susans have the unique capacity to sit much closer to the table surface because the swivel base is actually recessed into the bottom due to the built up edges.  The 24 inch comes standard with the 12 inch steel swivel base pictured below.  Click here to access my premium swivel base order page.  Click here for custom stain options.
